/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a sweeping view of the street below. The street itself is divided by a median, creating a sense of symmetry and order. On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the scene. The street is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green against the urban landscape. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a subtle reminder of the city's infrastructure. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both bustling and serene.
